name: Dungeon Buster (fraedrik, Nackles42, Peppero, soniclinkerman)
description:
Guide a party of reckless adventurers through a trap-filled, monster-ridden dungeon to the treasure. Adventurers will not let you control them directly, instead you are put in the shoes of a mage who points them in the right direction using spells. Will you succeed and obtain the treasure, or lead your party to their doom?

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD or Arrow keys.
  • Cast Spells - 1 to 5. Point to the spot you want the Adventurers to go to and press the button.
